item.title: The cost of IVF: How far did you go to pay for your fertility treatment?

item.title: Marrying for health insurance? The ACA cost crisis forces some drastic choices
item.description: While Congress debates bringing back Affordable Care Act subsidies, many Americans have already made life-altering decisions to afford health care.

item.title: How IVF has led to a record number of single moms in their 40s
item.description: Who gets to be a parent has been reshaped by IVF: Single women in their 40s are increasingly opting to become moms.

item.title: Exercise is as effective as medication in treating depression, study finds

item.title: New Orleans is bringing house calls back to support new moms
item.description: To support new moms, the city of New Orleans is trying a medical practice from the past: the house call.
